column1:
Helping Realize Life’s Potential

  • We invest in your career growth – vast career mobility & opportunity
  • We expose you to high performance culture – global experience
  • We provide a supportive & caring environment – diversified & high-quality team.

Culture and Benefits:

  • Career development and growth opportunities in a global environment
  • Diversity & Inclusion: We are Diverse and Value our Differences
  • Access to LinkedIn learning and internal training landscape
  • Hybrid work environment

What This Job Involves

Hach Company manufactures and distributes analytical instruments and reagents used to test the quality of water and other liquid solutions. We are looking for a Order Management Specialist with minimum 2-3 years of work experience in similar fields for this growing segment. To be based in Kuala Lumpur
column2: Malaysia and covering for Australia and New Zealand region (ANZ).

column1:
What you’ll do

  • Main task is to do the Order booking in Oracle.
  • Knowledge of commercial terms of a purchase order.
  • Working on Discount Approval process and taking approval as per DOA.
  • Working with finance for finance validations & Supply chain for allocating ship sets.
  • Work on Shipment Plan
column2: Hold release of orders through oracle
column3:
Item allocation with the help of Supply chain team.
  • Sending PI to customers and follow-up for Payments and get it applied with the help of finance.
  • Work on Return/RMA’s & customer complaint and follow-up with respective stakeholders for resolving customer issues.
  • Generation of pre orders & FOC orders (Rejected order/ to fulfilled orders)
  • Reply to queries from customers on Orders related tasks such as : Delivery period
column9:
Shelf life details etc.
  • Bridge between customer / field sales team / After Market team / service team and supply chain
  • Work on New Customer creation & Vendor registration.
  • Working on customer portals for order related activities.
  • Filling Demo forms and supporting sales team to issue demo instruments from Supply chain.
  • Working on PBG required by customer with the help of finance team.
  • Support Customer Service teams as needed
  • Collect data and consolidate information from Salesforce.com
  • Drive daily management / visual management rhythms for the quote-to-book-Payment process
  • Support and/or lead relevant continuous improvement initiatives from time to time
  • Deliver key outputs within relevant service levels

column1:
Material Planner

  • Roll up material CTB (Clear to Build) & shortages per the demand loaded and work with buyers for improvement.
  • Manage work orders aging <14 days.
  • Justify & submit E&O (excess and obsolete) claims timely to CSCM.
  • Manage ECO (engineering change orders) parts and ensure no exposure.
  • Attend customer calls & articulate shortages clearly for CTB (Clear to Build) improvement.
  • Inventory management to meet quoted ITO.

Production Planner

  • Prepare detail production scheduling on shift & weekly basis.
  • Measure pack plan vs actual.
  • Manage WIP aging <7 days
  • Manage WOs aging <14 days
  • Commit ship plan to meet customer request considering the right MLT.
  • Meet OTD 100%
The experience we’re looking to add to our team:

• Requires a Bachelor degree or equivalent.
  • A minimum of 3-5 years of experience in field.

column1:
Job Description

Title: Accounts Receivable Analyst / Senior Analyst (Thai speaker)

Department: Finance Shared Service Center (FSSC)

Reporting Manager: FSSC Process Controller (Accounts Receivable)

Location: Subang Jaya

Job Purpose:

  • Process accounting transactions ensuring compliance with Service Level Agreement and defined performance standards.
  • Delivery high level customer service within responsible areas.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Responsible to migrate the AR function into FSSC.
  • Responsible to generate the sales invoices
column2:
ensure timeliness and accuracy within the agreed SLA.
  • Handle cash application processes
column3:
including reconciliation of unapplied payments.
  • Responsible to maintain the customer master data.
  • Involve in collection process
column4: including generating and analyse AR ageing reports
column6:
calculate penalties and escalation of long outstanding payments.
  • Ensure timely month end AR closing and reconcile to GL.
  • Liaise with internal and external stakeholders to resolve customer account issues.
  • Escalate issues timely
column7:
ensure operational issues are appropriately prioritised and resolved.
  • Collaborate with project members during process enhancements and system implementations.
  • Strictly implement ASSA Group internal control system and FSSC internal policy on daily operation
  • Perform other tasks and projects as assigned.

column1:

column2:

  • Proficiency in English and Thai language.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and attention to detail.

Are you an energetic and enthusiastic person with experience and technical expertise on semiconductor technologies? Are you eager to contribute to the technological evolution with your knowledge and skills? Then this might be your dream job! Join Infineon as we shape the future! Be part of the change! Apply now! As Senior Technical Problem Solving Expert Wide Band Gap (WBG) you will:

• Contribute to complex development or innovation projects for the next generation of power semiconductors using new WBG materials like SiC- and GaN
  • Lead problem-solving teams and support our WBG-program
  • Apply and improve problem solving methodology combined with strong analytical background
  • Continuously enhance your technical expertise in the area of basematerial

metallization and passivation
